Services

Road Construction

We offer road construction services ranging from large-scale projects to individual special projects. With specialisation that spans across three decades , our expertise makes us one of the finest service providers for road construction. We offer Both Bitumen as well as Concrete road construction services as per the requirements of our esteemed clients. Let’s together build the highway to your dreams !!!

Services

Building Construction

We possess the specialisation and requisite expertise to provide excellent building construction services to our clients. We at Perfect Constructions make use of latest structural designing, and building technology to meet the increasing demands of the clients and make sure about the completion of these distinguished engineering structures within the stipulated time frame to enhance customer satisfaction. Since based on modern concept, our projects are reckoned in the industry for their aesthetic and elegant look.

Services

Electrical Works

We provide professional service in the domain of Electrical services. We are a leading service provider efficiently serving a rich clientele with our Electrical Contracting Services. We execute both individual and turnkey projects as per the industry standards. It is ensured that quality standards are maintained, and customer satisfaction is achieved at the highest level.

Services

Plumbing Works Contract

We are professional service providers of complete plumbing and sanitation services for Industrial, Residential and Commercial purposes. Our expertise lies in Water Supply Systems, Drainage Systems , Sanitary & C.P. Fittings, Pump Installations and other allied services. We assure of excellent workmanship and high-quality services and reiterate our commitment to provide the Best service that our customer deserves that helps us achieve utmost customer satisfaction.

Services

Fabrication works

We have equipped our infrastructure with latest equipment, machines, tools and advanced technology. Apart from this, our team has rich technical expertise that helps us in rendering effective and cost-efficient engineering services such as Steel Fabrication, Aluminium Fabrication, Industrial shed Fabrication and other heavy engineering works. Keeping a pace with new technology and high quality standards, we at Perfect Constructions offer reliable, result oriented and financially viable solutions to our esteemed clients.

Services

Interior and exterior renovations

We are a one stop service provider when it comes to full home interior designing, finest modular kitchen designs, commercial renovations, workplace renovations and also bring to you our 3D design service which helps to view a 360 degree panoramic image that helps the client to view the project at pre execution stage. We also execute all exterior renovations including waterproofing works, polymer treatment, painting works and other allied civil works.

About Company

Established in Mumbai, (Maharashtra) , Perfect Constructions is renowned for providing sustainable bespoke solutions in the construction domain. Our specialization spans across all the gamut of the construction industry. Blending technology with innovative designs, our construction philosophy encompasses social and environmental commitment in addition to the financial viability.

Perfect Constructions has executed various Infrastructure projects which are orchestrated with consistent quality and safety assurance and adherence to planned project schedule.

We are engaged in providing various kind of civil construction service that include Roads and Highways Construction, Building Construction, Electrical Works, , Plumbing Works Contract, Civil Construction work, Industrial Roads, Heavy Fabrication works ,Interior and Exterior renovation as well as other allied civil works as per the requirements of our esteemed clients.

As we are a renowned quality centric organisation, the procurement of materials are done only after a series of checks from the quality inspection unit and also by infusing latest and high performance machinery and equipments in our service helps us achieve our goal of the best possible outcome with complete client satisfaction.

Sound expertise, experience and strong ethics, makes us the “GO TO” company for all your construction needs. Timely execution and transparency, has made us take giant leaps in the construction industry with the sky as the limit!

MISSION STATEMENT

To provide the best construction experience through-Relationships built on integrity. Success built on performance. Fueled by a commitment to continual improvement, both personally and professionally.

VISION STATEMENT

To be sought out as the recognised and trusted firm in the industry and community; retaining, developing, and attracting the best in committed construction leadership; and to drive deliberate and intelligent growth of the company.

Our Core values

  • Integrity and Honesty—We do what we say we will do.
  • Accountable and Responsible—We achieve results.
  • Motivated and Professional—We are problem solvers.
  • Safety and Quality—We will deliver quality without compromise.
  • Customer centered – Our success depends on our customer’s satisfaction.
